University Courses

Overview

XinFin Blockchain Training Academy, in association with SPIT & K.J. Somiya College Centre for Continuing Education offers first-of-its kind 8-hours classroom training program providing in-depth knowledge about blockchain technology to build Blockchain-based applications for enterprises and businesses. Certified Blockchain Professional credential certifies the individuals in Blockchain discipline of Distributed Ledger Technology from a vendor-neutral perspective

Enterprises are struggling to identify the right talent to deploy in-house Blockchain-based projects. This certification will work as a bridge between resources & businesses (employees, consultants & advisers) to give enterprises confidence in the quick hire.

Our technological partners

Join us in our mission to educate and train up blockchain professionals
